138 struct PgpEvrControl {
139 
141  uint32_t lane;
142 
144  uint32_t evrEnable; // Global flag
145 
147  uint32_t laneRunMask; // 1 = Run trigger enable
148 
150  uint32_t evrSyncEn; // 1 = Start, 0 = Stop
151 
153  uint32_t evrSyncSel; // 0 = async, 1 = sync for start/stop
154 
156  uint32_t headerMask; // 1 = Enable header data checking, one bit per VC (4 bits)
157 
159  uint32_t evrSyncWord; // fiducial to transition start stop
160 
162  uint32_t runCode; // Run code
163 
165  uint32_t runDelay; // Run delay
166 
168  uint32_t acceptCode; // Accept code
169 
171  uint32_t acceptDelay; // Accept delay
172 
173  uint32_t pad;
174 };
175 
177 struct PgpEvrStatus {
178 
180  uint32_t lane;
181 
183  uint32_t linkErrors;
184 
186  uint32_t linkUp;
187 
189  uint32_t runStatus; // 1 = Running, 0 = Stopped
190 
192  uint32_t evrSeconds;
193 
195  uint32_t runCounter;
196 
198  uint32_t acceptCounter;
199 
200  uint32_t pad;
201 };

203 // Card Types
204 #define PGP_NONE 0x00
205 #define PGP_GEN1 0x01
206 #define PGP_GEN2 0x02
207 #define PGP_GEN2_VCI 0x12
208 #define PGP_GEN3 0x03
209 #define PGP_GEN3_VCI 0x13
210 
211 // Error values
212 #define PGP_ERR_EOFE 0x10
213 
214 // Commands
215 #define PGP_Read_Info 0x2001
216 #define PGP_Read_Pci 0x2002
217 #define PGP_Read_Status 0x2003
218 #define PGP_Set_Loop 0x2004
219 #define PGP_Count_Reset 0x2005
220 #define PGP_Send_OpCode 0x2006
221 #define PGP_Set_Data 0x2007
222 #define PGP_Set_Evr_Cntrl 0x3001
223 #define PGP_Get_Evr_Cntrl 0x3002
224 #define PGP_Get_Evr_Status 0x3003
225 #define PGP_Rst_Evr_Count 0x3004
226 
227 // Everything below is hidden during kernel module compile
228 #ifndef DMA_IN_KERNEL
229 
230 static inline uint32_t pgpSetDest(uint32_t lane, uint32_t vc) {
231  uint32_t dest;
232 
233  dest = lane * 4;
234  dest += vc;
235  return(dest);
236 }
237 
238 static inline uint32_t pgpSetFlags(uint32_t cont){
239  return(cont & 0x1);
240 }
241 
242 static inline uint32_t pgpGetLane(uint32_t dest) {
243  return(dest / 4);
244 }
245 
246 static inline uint32_t pgpGetVc(uint32_t dest) {
247  return(dest % 4);
248 }
249 
250 static inline uint32_t pgpGetCont(uint32_t flags) {
251  return(flags & 0x1);
252 }
253 
254 // Read Card Info
255 static inline ssize_t pgpGetInfo(int32_t fd, struct PgpInfo * info) {
256  return(ioctl(fd,PGP_Read_Info,info));
257 }
258 
259 // Read PCI Status
260 static inline ssize_t pgpGetPci(int32_t fd, struct PciStatus * status) {
261  return(ioctl(fd,PGP_Read_Pci,status));
262 }
263 
264 // Read Lane Status
265 static inline ssize_t pgpGetStatus(int32_t fd, uint32_t lane, struct PgpStatus * status) {
266  status->lane = lane;
267  return(ioctl(fd,PGP_Read_Status,status));
268 }
269 
270 // Set Loopback State For Lane
271 static inline ssize_t pgpSetLoop(int32_t fd, uint32_t lane, uint32_t state) {
272  uint32_t temp;
273 
274  temp = lane & 0xFF;
275  temp |= ((state << 8) & 0x100);
276 
277  return(ioctl(fd,PGP_Set_Loop,temp));
278 }
279 
280 // Reset counters
281 static inline ssize_t pgpCountReset(int32_t fd) {
282  return(ioctl(fd,PGP_Count_Reset,0));
283 }
284 
285 // Set Sideband Data
286 static inline ssize_t pgpSetData(int32_t fd, uint32_t lane, uint32_t data) {
287  uint32_t temp;
288 
289  temp = lane & 0xFF;
290  temp |= ((data << 8) & 0xFF00);
291 
292  return(ioctl(fd,PGP_Set_Data,temp));
293 }
294 
295 // Send OpCode
296 static inline ssize_t pgpSendOpCode(int32_t fd, uint32_t code) {
297  return(ioctl(fd,PGP_Send_OpCode,code));
298 }
299 
300 // Set EVR Control
301 static inline ssize_t pgpSetEvrControl(int32_t fd, uint32_t lane, struct PgpEvrControl * control) {
302  control->lane = lane;
303  return(ioctl(fd,PGP_Set_Evr_Cntrl,control));
304 }
305 
306 // Get EVR Control
307 static inline ssize_t pgpGetEvrControl(int32_t fd, uint32_t lane, struct PgpEvrControl * control) {
308  control->lane = lane;
309  return(ioctl(fd,PGP_Get_Evr_Cntrl,control));
310 }
311 
312 // Get EVR Status
313 static inline ssize_t pgpGetEvrStatus(int32_t fd, uint32_t lane, struct PgpEvrStatus * status) {
314  status->lane = lane;
315  return(ioctl(fd,PGP_Get_Evr_Status,status));
316 }
317 
318 // Reset EVR Counters
319 static inline ssize_t pgpResetEvrCount(int32_t fd, uint32_t lane) {
320  return(ioctl(fd,PGP_Rst_Evr_Count,lane));
321 }
322 
323 // Add destination to mask byte array
324 static inline void pgpAddMaskBytes(uint8_t * mask, uint32_t lane, uint32_t vc) {
325  dmaAddMaskBytes(mask,lane*4+vc);
326 }
327 
328 // set lane/vc rx mask, one bit per vc
329 static inline ssize_t pgpSetMask(int32_t fd, uint32_t lane, uint32_t vc) {
330  return(dmaSetMask(fd, lane*4+vc));
331 }
